title: Curry Chicken and Rice
directions: In a large saucepan, bring water and oil to a boil. Stir in pilaf mix, contents of seasoning packet and curry powder. Return to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, covered, 15 minutes.
Stir in chicken, tomatoes and peas. Cook, covered, 8-10 minutes longer or until liquid is almost absorbed and rice is tender. Sprinkle with cashews. Yield: 4 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (14-1/2 ounces) diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, undrained
